page.title: 04What we like about Walsden.
page.content: Many Walsden residents were asked to identify the main features of their district. The responses to this are varied. The feature which came out as foremost was the physical aspects of the area, the hills, the Pennine Way which passes in the hills above Walsden, the views and the valley sides. Various sports clubs, notably Walsden Cricket and Bowling Club, came as the next most popular feature. The work places and the Garden Centre came next, followed by St. Peters church, which is well supported by local residents. The communication network; the road, rail and canal system were identified as the next feature which typified the district and this was followed by the friendliness of local people and the village spirit.
